title: Buddy 1
description: Buddy is a continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) tool that automates the software development process. It allows developers to build, test, and deploy applications quickly and efficiently.

title: Buddy CLI
description: Buddy CLI is a command-line interface for Buddy, allowing developers to interact with the Buddy platform directly from their terminal. It provides commands for managing projects, pipelines, and deployments.

title: Buddy API
description: Buddy API is a RESTful API that allows developers to programmatically interact with the Buddy platform. It provides endpoints for managing projects, pipelines, and deployments.
